greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(x^3, x^5) in powers of x where f() is Ramanujan's two-variable theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Characteristic function of A074378. a(n) = 1 if and only if n is in A074378.
mathematica: f[x_, y_]:= QPochhammer[-x, x*y]*QPochhammer[-y, x*y]*QPochhammer[x*y, x*y]; A214264[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[f[x^3, x^5], {x, 0, n}]; Table[A214264[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 03 2017 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jul 09 2012
